text_block_list.text:
Winning Ticket looks worse for wear after her anxiety-filled exit from 
public training.

She must be shocked about it more than anyone. But with no remedy, 
things continue like this until the Derby is only a few days away.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Being broadcast live on TV is really nerve-racking. I can't mess up like 
I did at the Satsuki Sho prerace press conference.

There's a press conference today for the runners who are participating 
in the Derby.

She watches the other athletes on TV, waiting until she's called in for 
her turn.
choice_data_list:
Have you thought about what you're going to 
say?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Um… A little…
She sounds hesitant as she keeps her eyes on the television.

text_block_list.name: Host
text_block_list.text:
The Derby this year is full of strong contenders. Tell us how you feel 
about that.

text_block_list.name: Racer
text_block_list.text:
Naturally, I've been keeping an eye on all my rivals and how they 
race. So I understand that they all have serious skills on the track.

text_block_list.name: Racer
text_block_list.text:
But I've finally made it to this once-in-a-lifetime race. All I'm thinking 
about is taking the lead and crossing the finish line.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Wow, she knows how to keep her eyes on the prize. I can tell she 
means it too.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I think I'll say that I've always dreamed of this race—that I'm going to 
win it and become a Derby champion.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: But… that's not how I really feel. I'm actually terrified of losing.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, sorry for being wishy-washy. I'm just no good at this.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Everyone else is saying how much they want to win the Derby, but I'm 
probably the only one this scared.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I can barely feel my legs. It's like they're not mine or something.
You're right. No one's more scared than you are right now.
You're right. No one's more scared than you are right now.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, I knew it. If I go out there like this, they'll all laugh at me.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I'm not gonna win the Derby. It's better if I just qui—

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huh? I can?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
What're you saying?! Even you admitted it! I'm way more scared than 
anyone else! I'm the weakest runner here…
That's exactly why you can win!
That's exactly why you can win!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
That ridiculous! Only a loser squirms in their shoes at such an 
important race!

The reason why you're more scared than anyone else is because you 
want to win the Derby more than anyone else.

The reason why you're more scared than anyone else is because you 
want to win the Derby more than anyone else.

Your legs are shaking just thinking about losing. No one is this serious 
about wanting to win it.

My mentor said it too. "That long-held dream is a strength that will 
serve her well in the Derby."

You've wanted it longer than anyone. Ever since you saw the race with 
your own eyes when you were a kid!

You've wanted it longer than anyone. Ever since you saw the race with 
your own eyes when you were a kid!
I hold up her Derby notebook.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh… My notebook.

When you've got nothing left, the weight of your dream is going to 
push you forward—past everyone who doesn't want this as 
desperately as you!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: The weight of my dream… pushes me forward…
And then you're going to write it down in this notebook.
choice_data_list: You're going to write us down as Derby winners!
You're going to write us down as Derby winners!

text_block_list.text: And then you're going to write it down in this notebook.
choice_data_list: You're going to write us down as Derby winners!
You're going to write us down as Derby winners!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Sob… The Derby… The thing I've wanted my entire life!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I wanna win! It's always been my dream! I'm scared, but I can't quit 
now! URAAAAAGH!
As usual, she has to yell through tears when talking about the Derby.

When I hear her cry echoing out down the halls, I know it—Winning 
Ticket is back.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Whoo! That was a good cry! I mean, I'm always crying, but that was an especially good one, hehe.
Do you know what you want to say to the reporters?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I'm terrified about losing, but my will to win is as great as my fear! 
After all, I've got a big dream to fulfill!
choice_data_list: Then let's make sure everyone knows that.
Then let's make sure everyone knows that.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Right! Now I'm really raring to go! DEEERBYYYYY!
Knock, knock, knock…

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: Sorry to intrude. Winning Ticket, you're up next.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Okay! I'm ready for it!

As she and Tazuna make to leave, we hear a familiar name from the 
TV.

text_block_list.name: Host
text_block_list.text: All right, next we have Narita Taishin.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, it's Taishin! Sorry, Ms. Tazuna! Can you wait just a minute?

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: Very well, just one minute…

text_block_list.name: Host
text_block_list.text:
It looks like you've been training very hard, Ms. Taishin. You don't 
seem to let up, even after winning the Satsuki Sho.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Of course. My opponents aren't sitting quiet after they lost the 
Satsuki Sho. So I can't take it easy either. I won't let this slip by me.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: The only thing my rivals are going to see in the Derby is my back.
Taishin's definitely going to be bringing her A game again.
Taishin's definitely going to be bringing her A game again.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Sure, but I'll be the one in front this time!

text_block_list.name: Host
text_block_list.text: Moving on, here is Biwa Hayahide.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hayahide! Ms. Tazuna, just one more minute!

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: What?! But you're on immediately after her!
She's an Umamusume. She can get her there in an instant!

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: Not you too! This is live television!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I was able to make it to the Derby due in no small part to the 
existence of my rivals.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
When my peers got one step ahead, I strove to take two. In doing so, 
we pushed each other forward to make it here.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
However, simply being in the race isn't the goal. My aim is to race 
against my rivals and win.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hehehe, let's do it, Hayahide!
choice_data_list:
Catch up to them, and then keep going right 
past!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! I'll run like never before! Our Derby is going to be the greatest 
Derby ever!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Now that my mind's made up, I have to get moving right this moment! 
Super sorry, Ms. Tazuna, but I'm skipping the press conference!

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: Whaaat?! S-stop right there, Winning Ticket!

Sorry, she needs to be at peak performance, so there's no time to 
spare.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: You couldn't have told me that sooner?!

Winning Ticket runs off once again, but this time, it's toward the 
Derby.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Uwaaaaagh! Faster! Faster, faster!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: So that's why she didn't come to the conference—she was running.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Yes, but… why is she running in her uniform?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Haha, that's just the way she is. When it comes to the Derby, 
nothing'll stop her from running.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I'M GONNA WIIIN! DEEEEERBYYYYY!

Her pure passion for the Derby can be heard in her resounding 
footsteps as she blasts toward the racetrack.
